title: Senior Angular Engineer

title: Full-Stack Software Engineer

CoverWallet has the mentality and culture of a high-growth startup with the backing and support of a global multinational company.About the role:We are currently seeking a Senior Front End Engineer with experience working with React.This is just the start. Â As an organization, we are united through trust as one inclusive, diverse team, and we are passionate about helping our colleagues and clients succeed.What the day will look likeFrontend based applications developmentWork with Designers and Product Managers to implement design and products interfacesWork with Backend Engineers to build and deliver features, on top of RESTful APIsBuild efficient and reusable front-end systems and abstractionsContribute to designing the architecture of our Frontend systemAddress performance issuesParticipate in code reviews, identify and apply best practices for software developmentProvide technical guidance and hands-on experience in software development. title: Senior Full-Stack Developer
description: The Role:We are looking for a highly motivated and senior Full-Stack Engineer to join Goods. We are an early stage start-up, so you will join an amazing everyday adventure and a small team who passionately works on crafting the best and most sustainable ship-from-store solution in the US.This is a unique opportunity to work at the earliest stages at a well-funded start-up supported by great VC's and a group of prominent angel investors, where you'll be a big part of leading and driving the initial build up of our full tech stack. Therefore we're looking for someone who has experience, is able to understand the entirety of the tech stack, who can help lead the build, able to communicate clearly and able to gradually take on more and more of an engineering lead role, however in the early days ready to be heads down focused and doing hands-on coding.Expectations:Extensive JavaScript experience - as well as TypeScriptNode.js is your friend, and perhaps Next.js is no stranger tooExperience with API-development and onboarding documentationCreating and debugging complex backend integrationsEvent-driven system design experienceNot afraid of CSS - ideally experience with Tailwind CSSModern cloud infrastructure - ideally Firebase & Google Cloud Platform experienceVercel or Netlify experience would be nice (however not required)We expect you have a great deal of autonomy and are ready to take on responsibility, and ready to work in tight-knitted collaboration with key stakeholders.Furthermore, we expect that you love coding, exploring and brainstorming on solutions. Hopefully you enjoy being involved in various aspects of the product development. Your knowledge is rather based on actual experience than theory. Last but not least, you are not hesitant about expressing your opinions and comfortably speaking up.What can you expect from us?We're at an early stage, so you can expect a fast-paced environment and the ability to make a significant impact on the company's technology and product development. You'd be a part of a small team with great autonomy, so you can expect we provide a lot of freedom and responsibility. We tend to value speed, iterations and frequent feedback loops over perfection from the beginning. We'll gradually get to perfection.Overall we are customer obsessed, which means we are always ready to experiment, test and we strive to constantly learn and gather feedback from customers, which inputs we value and often prioritize before anything else.We'll love to occasionally spend some days with you on-site in a location nearby you and later in New York City where we'll be launching.About Goods Delivery:Goods is a sustainable ship-from-store solution, which enables brands to offer same-day delivery and on-demand return pickups. We're transforming the way brands with physical stores fulfill ecommerce orders, by leveraging their network of retail locations as microwarehouses, and encouraging them to ship online orders from locations close to their customers.This means brands can offer same-day delivery at the same cost as ground shipping which often takes 5-7 business days, and they can offer the most convenient pickup of returns at the costumers door. This is not only among the fastest and cheapest delivery, it is also completely emission free. This makes it the most sustainable delivery- and return method, which saves the planet from tons of CO2 emission.We're a small team (4-5 folks) who comes from the intersection of fashion, technology, ecommerce and logistics, and we work with advisors with relevant experience from companies such as Uber, Sephora, Doordash, GoPuff, Amazon, Netlify and Nike.Our vision is A world where goods travel lessâ€ and deliver more happiness.We hope you're ready for a journey from the earliest stages of a company. We're looking forward to connect with you!

title: Fullstack Developer
